name.en: ntroduction to Literature and Hakka Literature

department.ch: 客家語文暨社會科學學系
department.en: Department of Hakka Language and Social Sciences

goal.ch: 一、建立學生對文學與客家文學的基礎認識。二、選讀客家文學文本，培養學生愛鄉愛土的情懷。三、訓練學生聽說讀寫客語文學的基礎能力。四、陶冶學生的性情並提升美學素養。
goal.en: 1. Establish a basic understanding of literature and Hakka literature for students taking this course.2. Selecting the texts of Hakka literature to cultivate the feelings of loving the hometown and the soil of the students taking this course.3. To train the basic abilities of listening, speaking, reading, and writing in Hakka literature.4. Cultivate the temperament of the students who study this course and improve their aesthetic qualities.

outline.ch: 第1週課程說明第2週什麼是文學？文學與人生第3週每趟旅程都是追尋第4週那是象徵嗎？第5週讀書，地點很重要，季節也很重要第6週什麼是客家文學？第7週客家文學有哪些？第8週期中考檢討第9週凡七言四句的都是絕句？客家古典詩歌選讀第10週政治，政治，怎麼都是政治？客家新文學選讀第11週用什麼語言有差嗎？客語散文選讀與創作第12週想像的翅膀客語新詩選讀與創作第13週這個好像在哪裡看過？客語流行歌詞選讀與創作第14週作家演講：客語文學創作經驗分享第15週他是認真的嗎？關於反諷客家文學改編影視作品選讀第16週談性不是性，不談性才是性客家文學改編影視作品選讀第17週 自學：客家影視文學欣賞與心得撰寫第18週 自學：客家影視文學欣賞與心得撰寫

Literature and lifeWeek 3 Every trip is a pursuitWeek 4 Is that a symbol?Week 5 Reading, location is important, season is also importantWeek 6 What is Hakka literature?Week 7 What are Hakka literature?Week 8 Midterm reviewWeek 9 Where are the Seven-character and four sentences are quatrains?Selected Hakka Classical PoetryWeek 10 Politics, politics, how are politics?Selected Readings of Hakka New LiteratureWeek 11 What language will it affect?Selected Reading and Creation of Hakka ProseWeek 12 Imagined wingsSelected Reading and Creation of New Poetry in HakkaWeek 13 Where does this seem to have been seen?Selected Reading and Creation of Popular Lyrics in HakkaWeek 14 Writer's Speech: Sharing Experience in Hakka Literature CreationWeek 15 Is he serious? About ironySelected Reading of Hakka literature works adapted for film and televisionWeek 16 Talk about sex is not sex, not sex is sexSelected Reading of Hakka literature works adapted for film and televisionWeek 17 Self-study: Hakka film and television literature appreciation and experience writingWeek 18 Self-study: Hakka film and television literature appreciation and experience writing

flexDiscription.ch: 本課程實體上課16週。未上課的那兩週，將安排同學觀賞客家電影或電視作品，並撰寫學習單（觀後心得）。
flexDiscription.en: This course takes 16 weeks of physical education. In the two weeks when there is no physical class, students will be arranged to watch Hakka movies or TV and write their thoughts after watching.

The academic ability of social sciences
The perspectives to reflect times changes and to create new developmen
